channel.title: Admin
channel.description: Well im having a server with me and some friends and im wondering how can i be admin? please help me (A)

item.title: Admin
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Snipe Ancient Snipe
item.description:
@Ancient_Snipe wrote:

[quote=“jules1313, post:3, topic:42245”][quote author=P K SARA link=topic=59046.msg720063#msg720063 date=1167689068]
go to characters folder, double click the notepad, change character rights to 2 for admin 1 for mod
[/quote]’

tried, wont work[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 11:23:17 AM[/size][hr]Help please?

REP++ FOR ANYONE WHO’S GONNA HELP ME![/quote]
No you fucktard, you won’t rep becouse you need 15 rep to rep+ other poeple
